SLogo.Turtles

Interface Turtle

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ObservableTurtle

    public interface Turtle
    This interface provides an API for a model of a SLogo turtle

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Type Property and Description
      Property to
      Put all Turtle configuration data into a Property object to be written into an XML file.

    • Field Summary

        Returns:
        change in heading angle

                                 double y)
        Set heading towards a specific point
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of point
        y - y-coordinate of point
        Returns:
        angle moved

      • penDown

        default boolean penDown()
        Sets pen to down position.
        Returns:
        1

      • isPenDown

        boolean isPenDown()
        Returns:
        true if pen is down, false if pen is up

      • setTurtleShow

      • showTurtle

        default boolean showTurtle()
        Sets turtle to show
        Returns:
        1

      • hideTurtle

        default boolean hideTurtle()
        Sets turtle to hide
        Returns:
        0

      • isTurtleShow

        boolean isTurtleShow()
        Returns:
        returns true if turtle showing, else false if turtle hidden

      • reset

        default double reset()
        Calculate coordinate changes required to return Turtle to (0,0) from (curX, curY) and sets all instance variables to default values.
        Returns:
        distance moved

        o - Observer to be notified when changed
